li: Find login functionality. Find the code that is responsible for authentication.
Verify that session IDs are changed during login. Review code responsible for logging in to make sure that code exists that clears the existing session state and creates a new session ID.

Change session IDs during login. Add code that invalidates the current session ID and creates a new one.

strong: Verify that session IDs are changed during login.

html:
Applies To

  • Web Applications

What to Check For

Verify that session IDs are changed during login.

Why

Change session IDs during login to make sure that the session state corresponds to the authenticated user.

How to Check

To verify that session IDs are changed during login:

  1. Find login functionality. Find the code that is responsible for authentication.
  2. Verify that session IDs are changed during login. Review code responsible for logging in to make sure that code exists that clears the existing session state and creates a new session ID.

How to Fix

To change session IDs during login:

  1. Find login functionality. Find the code that is responsible for authentication.
  2. Change session IDs during login. Add code that invalidates the current session ID and creates a new one.
